## Description {#details}

Helper class for GenerateCrossUseConstantOffsets.

It&#39;s used to defer modifications so that the search phase doesn&#39;t have to worry about the data structures moving underneath it.

Definition at line 4484 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopstrengthreduce-cpp">LoopStrengthReduce.cpp</a>.
